title: Baked Garlic Chicken with Grapes
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1.35kg skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets or thighs', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds', '325g seedless green grapes']
